#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	vector<bool> A( 1001, true );
	vector<int> B;

	int i, k, n, t, sum, j;

	A[ 0 ] = A[ 1 ] = false;

	for( i = 2;( i * i ) <= 1000;i++  )
		for( j = ( i * i ); j <= 1000;j += i )
			if( A[ j ] )
				A[ j ] = false;

	for( i = 0;i <= 1000;i++ )
		if( A[ i ] )
			B.push_back( i );
	n = B.size();

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d", &k );
		sum = 0;

		for( i = 9;B[ i ] <= k;i++ )
			sum += B[ i ];

		printf("%d\n", sum );
	}

	return 0;
}
